reviews.name: Zhu Zhu Pets: Wild Bunch (DS)
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 7 year old daughter. She LOVES, LOVES, LOVES this game & has played it a LOT since receiving it on Christmas! It was purchased as part of a bundle & I am pleased with the price paid for the products received.
reviews.title: One of my daughter's FAVORITES!!!

reviews.name: Zhu Zhu Pets: Wild Bunch (DS)
reviews.reviewText: My grandaughter loves it and it took the sting out a little when she had to wait for ther expensive game, Ninten Dog - Retriever. Great little low cost game. She raved about it over the phone to me. She is 9 yr old and with a 12 yr old sister and an 8 yr old brother who all have the 3ds machines. They play each others games but she says this one is all hers. lol
reviews.title: Good low cost 2nd game for Christmas for my 10yr

reviews.name: Zhu Zhu Pets: Wild Bunch (DS)
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my daughter during the online sale before Christmas, and she loves it!
reviews.title: Great game for a great price!

reviews.name: Zhu Zhu Pets: Wild Bunch (DS)
reviews.reviewText: Great game for a my 6 yr old granddaughter!
reviews.title: 19 March 2013

reviews.name: Zhu Zhu Pets: Wild Bunch (DS)
reviews.reviewText: My daughter got this game and loves it. It is easy enough that she can play it without help and it reads the letters to you since she isn't very good at reading yet.
reviews.title: Easy for 6 yr old
